name: Make figures great again
body: ![neck](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dblarremore/make_figures_great_again/master/neck.jpg) Make Figures Great Again (MFGA) is **the** best way to make plots. Period. With nine terrific color palettes, and Python and Adobe modules, MFGA is hands down—and look, we know something about hands here folks—the number one way to elevate the class and impact of your figures. # Installation and Use ### Python installation pip install make-figures-great-again ### Python usage example # Make a plot with the "neck" color palette (top of this webpage) code example here → ### Adobe installation and use Just [download the palette below each inspirational photograph below. Then open the .aco file in Photoshop. # ↓ Nine simply outstanding palettes ↓ The amount of orange is a totally normal amount of orange. ## orange ![orange](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dblarremore/make_figures_great_again/master/orange.jpg) code example here [download
